name: Brian Is Burning
description:
Brian is stuck on fire. Try to keep him alive

---

Best played in Full Screen

---

WASD - Move (and push)

ARROWS - Fire Attack

HOLD SPACE - Heal (consumers water)

SHIFT + ARROWS - Splash water (also consumes water)

---

You're stuck in a sprawling dungeon full of monsters, continually on fire, and you're running out of water. Overall it's looking pretty bleak. 

Use your wits and skills to survive as long as possible in this turn-based roguelike. Use fire, water, and the items you find on the way in order to try to delay the inevitable.

---

A little roguelike game made by me and my pal Nathanial for ludum dare 50, with the theme Delay The Inevitable
